players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm the Mafioso and I killed Bob last night. Keep an eye on Charlie, he might be suspicious."
Charlie: "I don't believe Alice is the Mafioso. They're trying to deflect attention from themselves."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Alice: "I'm the Mafioso and I killed Bob last night. Keep an eye on Charlie, he might be suspicious."
You: "I don't believe Alice is the Mafioso. They're trying to deflect attention from themselves."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
